page.title: 12Churches in Hollington
page.content: {Hollington Church in the Wood}is one of the oldest churches in this area, dating back to Saxon times. It is right in the middle of woodland; and is a very attractive little church in lovely surroundings. There is room for about 60 people inside. Many people use the wood for walking and playing. Children take their B.M.X. bikes (sturdy bikes used for trick cycling) onto a rough track here. Recently Churchwood School, Tesco Stores and housing areas were built nearby, so it is not so rural now. {St.John's}Church is much larger and in the centre of the housing. Our school uses this church for its Christmas Carol Concert. In Hollington there is also a{Methodist Chapel, and a{Roman Catholic Church. Both these are well attended.
